holidays.title: International Day of Charity
holidays.description: Simple acts of charity can alleviate the worst effects of humanitarian crises.

holidays.title: Labor Day
holidays.description: Summer's final fling has arrived in the form of Labor Day.

holidays.title: National Cheese Pizza Day
holidays.description: Hold the toppings and savor a classic slice of ooey, gooey cheese pizza!

holidays.title: Mouthguard Day
holidays.description: Let's encourage people to wear mouthguards to reduce the risk of broken teeth and jaws!

holidays.title: National Be Late for Something Day
holidays.description: Tardiness is the new black: take the time to waste a moment!

holidays.title: National Cellulite Day
holidays.description: Let’s explore the history and significance of cellulite, and embrace our unique bodies!

holidays.title: National Child Protection Week
holidays.description: Join us in this annual nationwide campaign to keep children safe and secure.

holidays.title: National Shrink Day
holidays.description: Today is your chance to acknowledge and share your appreciation for these indispensable professionals.

holidays.title: Saint Teresa Canonisation Day in Albania
holidays.description: Let us pray and seek blessings from Mother Teresa this Saint Teresa Canonization Day.

holidays.title: West Indian Day Parade
holidays.description: West Indian culture is colorful and multifaceted. But what do we mean by "West Indian?"

holidays.title: World Samosa Day
holidays.description: Prepare your palates as we get ready to eat some delicious samosas.

holidays.title: Adam Calhoun’s Birthday
holidays.description: This well-known singer rose to prominence due to his numerous videos and captivating music.

holidays.title: Bob Newhart’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate this legendary television comedian, personality, producer, and actor.

holidays.title: Claudette Colvin’s Birthday
holidays.description: This brave civil rights activist will always be remembered and revered by history.

holidays.title: KellyP’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTuber is sweet and has a personality that will make you smile.

holidays.title: Rose McGowan’s Birthday
holidays.description: Besides being an actress, McGowan is an L.G.B.T.Q. and women's rights activist.
